amendment.description: Amendment sought to eliminate funding for the Native Hawaiian Housing Block Grant program.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 14 printed in the Congressional Record to strike the Native Hawaiin Housing Block Grant program.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Westmoreland amendment (A009) Failed by recorded vote: 116 - 307 (Roll no. 696).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A009) offered by Mr. Westmoreland.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
